sections.heading: Liability of owners or occupiers of land for injury to guests or trespassers
sections.text:
No person who enters onto private residential or farm premises owned or occupied by another person, either as a guest without payment or as a trespasser, shall have a cause of action against the owner or occupier of such pr

 1501;59 Del. Laws, c. 171,
